recipe.title: Grilled Hot Dogs with Mango Chutney and Red Onion Relish
ingredients: 1 (9-ounce) jar mango chutney (such as Major Grey's), any large pieces chopped
1 tablespoon Dijon mustard plus additional for serving
instructions: Mix chutney, onion, cilantro, and 1 tablespoon mustard in bowl. DO AHEAD_Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover; chill._ Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat). Grill hot dogs and buns until heated through and grill marks form, 2 to 3 minutes per side for hot dogs and about 1 minute per side for buns. Transfer buns to plate. Place 1 hot dog in each bun. Add mustard and relish; serve.
Mix chutney, onion, cilantro, and 1 tablespoon mustard in bowl. DO AHEAD_Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover; chill._

Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat). Grill hot dogs and buns until heated through and grill marks form, 2 to 3 minutes per side for hot dogs and about 1 minute per side for buns. Transfer buns to plate. Place 1 hot dog in each bun. Add mustard and relish; serve.
